mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( g.chuangjianshijian, '%m' ),"月") AS SHIJIAN, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM guahao g WHERE g.shenhejieguo = 1 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(g.chuangjianshijian,'%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(g.chuangjianshijian,'%m') asc

SELECT dn.text AS name, COUNT(g.guahaoid) AS value FROM dict_nianlingduan dn LEFT JOIN patient_jiuzhenxinxi p ON p.age = dn.id LEFT JOIN guahao g on g.jiuzhenxinxiid = p.jiuzhenxinxiid and g.shenhejieguo = 1 GROUP BY dn.id ORDER BY dn.ordernum ASC

SELECT db.text AS BINGZHONG, COUNT( g.guahaoid ) AS COUNT FROM dict_bingzhong db LEFT JOIN patient_jiuzhenxinxi p ON p.age = db.id LEFT JOIN guahao g on g.jiuzhenxinxiid = p.jiuzhenxinxiid and g.shenhejieguo = 1 GROUP BY db.id ORDER BY db.ordernum ASC

SELECT g.guahaoid AS id, g.jiuzhenxinxiid, g.userid, g.`name` AS xingming, '' AS bingzhong, g.paibanid, date_format(g.chuangjianshijian,'%Y-%m-%d')AS chuangjianshijian, g.shenhejieguo, g.shenheyijian, g.shenheshijian, g.zhuangtai, 'guahao' AS type, p.`name` AS zhuanjianame, date_format(p.paibanriqi,'%Y-%m-%d')AS paibanriqi, pj.shenfenzhenghaoma, pj.xingbie, pj.age, pj.nianling FROM guahao g LEFT JOIN paibanguanli p ON p.paibanid = g.paibanid LEFT JOIN patient_jiuzhenxinxi pj on pj.jiuzhenxinxiid = g.jiuzhenxinxiid WHERE (g.shenhejieguo = 0 or g.shenhejieguo = 1) and g.userid = #{userid} AND date_format(p.paibanriqi,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{date}

select g.guahaoid, g.jiuzhenxinxiid, g.userid, g.paibanid, g.`name` AS jiuzhenxingming, g.chuangjianshijian, g.zhuangtai, g.shenhejieguo, g.shenheshijian, g.shenheyijian, pg.expertid, pg.`name` AS zhuanjiaxingming, pg.guahaoleibie, pg.paibanriqi, pg.shangxiawu, pg.xianhaoshu, pg.shengyuhaoshu, pg.jiage, pg.zhuangtai, pj.shenfenzhenghaoma, pj.xingbie, pj.zhuyaozhengzhuang, pj.shoujihao, pj.age, pj.nianling, pj.lianxidizhi, pj.zhuangtai, pj.chuangjianshijian, e.* FROM guahao AS g INNER JOIN paibanguanli AS pg ON g.paibanid = pg.paibanid INNER JOIN patient_jiuzhenxinxi AS pj ON g.jiuzhenxinxiid = pj.jiuzhenxinxiid INNER JOIN expert AS e ON e.expertid = pg.expertid WHERE g.guahaoid = #{guahaoid}
